articles.title: ICC Rankings: Ruturaj Gaikwad climbs 143 places in T20I rankings, Suryakumar Yadav continues to lead list - India Today
articles.description: ICC Rankings: India opener in the Ireland series - Ruturaj Gaikwad has climbed 143 spots in the T20I rankings after his half-century in the 2nd T20I match of the series.
